sqlMap.select:
select ORDER_ID, USER_ID, OUT_PARKING_ID, PARKING_NAME, CAR_NUMBER, OUT_ORDER_NO, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_TIME, ORDER_NO, PAY_TIME, PAY_TYPE, PAY_MONEY, IN_TIME, PARKING_ID, IN_DURATION, CARD_NUMBER, DISCOUNT_MONEY, PAID_MONEY, SELLER_ID, OUT_TIME, ORDER_SYN_STATUS, ORDER_PAY_STATUS, CAR_ID, CAR_COLOR, CAR_TYPE, ORDER_TRADE from TB_ORDER_PAY
order by $orderByClause$
sqlMap.insert: insert into TB_ORDER_PAY (ORDER_ID, USER_ID, OUT_PARKING_ID, PARKING_NAME, CAR_NUMBER, OUT_ORDER_NO, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_TIME, ORDER_NO, PAY_TIME, PAY_TYPE, PAY_MONEY, IN_TIME, PARKING_ID, IN_DURATION, CARD_NUMBER, DISCOUNT_MONEY, PAID_MONEY, SELLER_ID, OUT_TIME, ORDER_SYN_STATUS, ORDER_PAY_STATUS, CAR_ID, CAR_COLOR, CAR_TYPE, ORDER_TRADE) values (#orderId:VARCHAR#, #userId:VARCHAR#, #outParkingId:VARCHAR#, #parkingName:VARCHAR#, #carNumber:VARCHAR#, #outOrderNo:VARCHAR#, #orderStatus:VARCHAR#, #orderTime:VARCHAR#, #orderNo:VARCHAR#, #payTime:VARCHAR#, #payType:VARCHAR#, #payMoney:VARCHAR#, #inTime:VARCHAR#, #parkingId:VARCHAR#, #inDuration:VARCHAR#, #cardNumber:VARCHAR#, #discountMoney:DECIMAL#, #paidMoney:DECIMAL#, #sellerId:VARCHAR#, #outTime:VARCHAR#, #orderSynStatus:VARCHAR#, #orderPayStatus:VARCHAR#, #carId:VARCHAR#, #carColor:VARCHAR#, #carType:VARCHAR#, #orderTrade:VARCHAR#)

insert into TB_ORDER_PAY
ORDER_ID
USER_ID
OUT_PARKING_ID

OUT_ORDER_NO

)
values
#orderId:VARCHAR#

#parkingName:VARCHAR#

)
sqlMap.update:
update TB_ORDER_PAY
ORDER_ID = #record.orderId:VARCHAR#
USER_ID = #record.userId:VARCHAR#
OUT_PARKING_ID = #record.outParkingId:VARCHAR#
PARKING_NAME = #record.parkingName:VARCHAR#
CAR_NUMBER = #record.carNumber:VARCHAR#
OUT_ORDER_NO = #record.outOrderNo:VARCHAR#
ORDER_STATUS = #record.orderStatus:VARCHAR#
ORDER_TIME = #record.orderTime:VARCHAR#
ORDER_NO = #record.orderNo:VARCHAR#
PAY_TIME = #record.payTime:VARCHAR#
PAY_TYPE = #record.payType:VARCHAR#
PAY_MONEY = #record.payMoney:VARCHAR#
IN_TIME = #record.inTime:VARCHAR#
PARKING_ID = #record.parkingId:VARCHAR#
IN_DURATION = #record.inDuration:VARCHAR#
CARD_NUMBER = #record.cardNumber:VARCHAR#
DISCOUNT_MONEY = #record.discountMoney:DECIMAL#
PAID_MONEY = #record.paidMoney:DECIMAL#
SELLER_ID = #record.sellerId:VARCHAR#
OUT_TIME = #record.outTime:VARCHAR#
ORDER_SYN_STATUS = #record.orderSynStatus:VARCHAR#
ORDER_PAY_STATUS = #record.orderPayStatus:VARCHAR#
CAR_ID = #record.carId:VARCHAR#
CAR_COLOR = #record.carColor:VARCHAR#
CAR_TYPE = #record.carType:VARCHAR#
ORDER_TRADE = #record.orderTrade:VARCHAR#

update TB_ORDER_PAY set ORDER_ID = #record.orderId:VARCHAR#, USER_ID = #record.userId:VARCHAR#, OUT_PARKING_ID = #record.outParkingId:VARCHAR#, PARKING_NAME = #record.parkingName:VARCHAR#, CAR_NUMBER = #record.carNumber:VARCHAR#, OUT_ORDER_NO = #record.outOrderNo:VARCHAR#, ORDER_STATUS = #record.orderStatus:VARCHAR#, ORDER_TIME = #record.orderTime:VARCHAR#, ORDER_NO = #record.orderNo:VARCHAR#, PAY_TIME = #record.payTime:VARCHAR#, PAY_TYPE = #record.payType:VARCHAR#, PAY_MONEY = #record.payMoney:VARCHAR#, IN_TIME = #record.inTime:VARCHAR#, PARKING_ID = #record.parkingId:VARCHAR#, IN_DURATION = #record.inDuration:VARCHAR#, CARD_NUMBER = #record.cardNumber:VARCHAR#, DISCOUNT_MONEY = #record.discountMoney:DECIMAL#, PAID_MONEY = #record.paidMoney:DECIMAL#, SELLER_ID = #record.sellerId:VARCHAR#, OUT_TIME = #record.outTime:VARCHAR#, ORDER_SYN_STATUS = #record.orderSynStatus:VARCHAR#, ORDER_PAY_STATUS = #record.orderPayStatus:VARCHAR#, CAR_ID = #record.carId:VARCHAR#, CAR_COLOR = #record.carColor:VARCHAR#, CAR_TYPE = #record.carType:VARCHAR#, ORDER_TRADE = #record.orderTrade:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.select:
select count(1) from TB_ORDER_PAY where 1=1
OUT_PARKING_ID = #outParkingId:VARCHAR#
CAR_NUMBER like '%$carNumber$%'
to_date(order_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=#startDate:TIMESTAMP#
to_date(order_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')<=#endDate:TIMESTAMP#
PAY_TYPE = #payType:VARCHAR#

select * from (select b.*, rownum rn from (select t.ORDER_ID orderId, t.USER_ID userId, t.OUT_PARKING_ID outParkingId, t.PARKING_NAME parkingName, t.CAR_NUMBER carNumber, t.OUT_ORDER_NO outOrderNo, t.ORDER_STATUS orderStatus, t.ORDER_TIME orderTime, t.ORDER_NO orderNo, t.PAY_TIME payTime, t.PAY_TYPE payType, t.PAY_MONEY payMoney, t.IN_TIME inTime, t.PARKING_ID parkingId, t.IN_DURATION inDuration, t.CARD_NUMBER cardNumber, t.DISCOUNT_MONEY discountMoney, t.PAID_MONEY paidMoney, t.SELLER_ID sellerId, t.OUT_TIME outTime, t.ORDER_SYN_STATUS orderSynStatus, t.ORDER_PAY_STATUS orderPayStatus, t.CAR_ID carId, t.CAR_COLOR carColor, t.CAR_TYPE carType, t.ORDER_TRADE orderTrade from TB_ORDER_PAY t where 1 = 1
t.OUT_PARKING_ID = #outParkingId:VARCHAR#
t.CAR_NUMBER like '%$carNumber$%'
to_date(t.order_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=#startDate:TIMESTAMP#
to_date(t.order_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')<=#endDate:TIMESTAMP#
t.PAY_TYPE = #payType:VARCHAR#
order by to_date(t.IN_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') desc ) b where rownum <= #end#) where rn > #start#

select t.ORDER_ID orderId, t.USER_ID userId, t.OUT_PARKING_ID outParkingId, t.PARKING_NAME parkingName, t.CAR_NUMBER carNumber, t.OUT_ORDER_NO outOrderNo, t.ORDER_STATUS orderStatus, t.ORDER_TIME orderTime, t.ORDER_NO orderNo, t.PAY_TIME payTime, t.PAY_TYPE payType, t.PAY_MONEY payMoney, t.IN_TIME inTime, t.PARKING_ID parkingId, t.IN_DURATION inDuration, t.CARD_NUMBER cardNumber, t.DISCOUNT_MONEY discountMoney, t.PAID_MONEY paidMoney, t.SELLER_ID sellerId, t.OUT_TIME outTime, t.ORDER_SYN_STATUS orderSynStatus, t.ORDER_PAY_STATUS orderPayStatus, t.CAR_ID carId, t.CAR_COLOR carColor, t.CAR_TYPE carType, t.ORDER_TRADE orderTrade from TB_ORDER_PAY t where 1 = 1
and to_date(t.order_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=#startDate:TIMESTAMP# and to_date(t.order_time,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')<=#endDate:TIMESTAMP#
t.OUT_PARKING_ID = #outParkingId:VARCHAR#
t.CAR_NUMBER like '%$carNumber$%'
t.PAY_TYPE = #payType:VARCHAR#

select * from (select b.*, rownum rn from ( select substr(p.pay_time, 0, 10) dateStr, (select nvl(sum(nvl(p1.PAID_MONEY, 0)), 0) from tb_order_pay p1 where p1.billing_typer = 'L' and substr(p1.pay_time, 0, 10) = substr(p.pay_time, 0, 10) and p1.out_parking_id=#outParkingId:VARCHAR#) tempTotalAmount, (select nvl(sum(nvl(p2.PAID_MONEY, 0)), 0) from tb_order_pay p2 where p2.billing_typer = 'L' and substr(p2.pay_time, 0, 10) = substr(p.pay_time, 0, 10) and p2.pay_type = '3' and p2.out_parking_id=#outParkingId:VARCHAR#) tempAmount, (select nvl(sum(nvl(p3.PAID_MONEY, 0)), 0) from tb_order_pay p3 where p3.billing_typer = 'L' and substr(p3.pay_time, 0, 10) = substr(p.pay_time, 0, 10) and p3.pay_type in ('1', '2') and p3.out_parking_id=#outParkingId:VARCHAR#) tempAlipayAmount, 0 tempWeiXinAmount, (select count(1) c from tb_order_pay p4 where substr(p4.in_time, 0, 10) = substr(p.pay_time, 0, 10) and p4.out_parking_id=#outParkingId:VARCHAR#) inTimeCount, (select count(1) c from tb_order p5 where substr(p5.in_time, 0, 10) = substr(p.pay_time, 0, 10) and p5.out_parking_id=#outParkingId:VARCHAR#) inTimeStayCount, (select count(1) c from tb_order p6 where substr(p6.out_time, 0, 10) = substr(p.pay_time, 0, 10) and p6.out_parking_id=#outParkingId:VARCHAR#) outTimeCount from tb_order_pay p where to_date(p.PAY_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') between to_date(#startDate:VARCHAR#, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#endDate:VARCHAR#, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and p.out_parking_id=#outParkingId:VARCHAR# group by substr(p.pay_time, 0, 10) ) b where rownum<= #end#) where rn > #start#

select count(1) from( select count(1) from tb_order_pay p where to_date(p.PAY_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') between to_date(#startDate:VARCHAR#, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#endDate:VARCHAR#, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and p.out_parking_id=#outParkingId:VARCHAR# group by substr(p.pay_time, 0, 10))

select * from( select 1 payType, '预计临停现金收费' payTypeName, count(1) totalCount, nvl(sum(nvl(p.paid_money,0)),0) transactionAmount, nvl(sum(decode(p.refund_money, null, 0, 1)),0) refundCount, nvl(sum(nvl(p.refund_money, 0)), 0) refundAmount, 0 merchantDiscount, 0 cloudDiscount, nvl(sum(nvl(p.paid_money,0)),0) actualAmount, 0 freeAmount, nvl(sum(nvl(p.paid_money,0)),0) settAmount from tb_order_pay p where to_date(p.PAY_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') between to_date(#startDate:VARCHAR#, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#endDate:VARCHAR#, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and p.out_parking_id = #outParkingId:VARCHAR# and p.pay_type ='3' union all select 2 payType, '支付宝' payTypeName, count(1) totalCount, nvl(sum(nvl(p.paid_money,0)),0) transactionAmount, nvl(sum(decode(p.refund_money, null, 0, 1)),0) refundCount, nvl(sum(nvl(p.refund_money, 0)), 0) refundAmount, 0 merchantDiscount, 0 cloudDiscount, nvl(sum(nvl(p.paid_money,0)),0) actualAmount, 0 freeAmount, nvl(sum(nvl(p.paid_money,0)),0) settAmount from tb_order_pay p where to_date(p.PAY_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') between to_date(#startDate:VARCHAR#, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#endDate:VARCHAR#, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') and p.out_parking_id = #outParkingId:VARCHAR# and p.pay_type in ('1', '2') union all select 3 payType, '微信' payTypeName, 0 totalCount, 0 transactionAmount, 0 refundCount, 0 refundAmount, 0 merchantDiscount, 0 cloudDiscount, 0 actualAmount, 0 freeAmount, 0 settAmount from dual)
where 1=1
payType = #payType:VARCHAR#

select sum(c) from(
select count(1) c from TB_ORDER_PAY p where 1=1
p.OUT_PARKING_ID = #outParkingId:VARCHAR#
p.CAR_NUMBER like '%$carNumber$%'
to_date(p.IN_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=#startDate:TIMESTAMP#
to_date(p.IN_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')<=#endDate:TIMESTAMP#
p.BILLING_TYPER = #billingTyper:VARCHAR#
union all
select count(1) c from TB_ORDER o where 1=1
o.OUT_PARKING_ID = #outParkingId:VARCHAR#
o.CAR_NUMBER like '%$carNumber$%'
to_date(o.IN_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=#startDate:TIMESTAMP#
to_date(o.IN_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')<=#endDate:TIMESTAMP#
o.BILLING_TYPER = #billingTyper:VARCHAR#
)

select * from (select b.*, rownum rn from ( select x.* from(
select p.ORDER_ID orderId, p.USER_ID userId, p.OUT_PARKING_ID outParkingId, p.PARKING_NAME parkingName, p.CAR_NUMBER carNumber, p.OUT_ORDER_NO outOrderNo, p.ORDER_STATUS orderStatus, p.ORDER_TIME orderTime, p.ORDER_NO orderNo, p.PAY_TIME payTime, p.PAY_TYPE payType, p.PAY_MONEY payMoney, p.IN_TIME inTime, p.PARKING_ID parkingId, p.IN_DURATION inDuration, p.CARD_NUMBER cardNumber, p.DISCOUNT_MONEY discountMoney, p.PAID_MONEY paidMoney, p.SELLER_ID sellerId, p.OUT_TIME outTime, p.ORDER_SYN_STATUS orderSynStatus, p.ORDER_PAY_STATUS orderPayStatus, p.CAR_ID carId, p.CAR_COLOR carColor, p.CAR_TYPE carType, p.ORDER_TRADE orderTrade, p.BILLING_TYPER billingTyper, p.LANE lane from TB_ORDER_PAY p where 1 = 1
p.OUT_PARKING_ID = #outParkingId:VARCHAR#
p.CAR_NUMBER like '%$carNumber$%'
to_date(p.IN_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=#startDate:TIMESTAMP#
to_date(p.IN_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')<=#endDate:TIMESTAMP#
p.BILLING_TYPER = #billingTyper:VARCHAR#
union all
select '' orderId, o.USER_ID userId, o.OUT_PARKING_ID outParkingId, o.PARKING_NAME parkingName, o.CAR_NUMBER carNumber, o.OUT_ORDER_NO outOrderNo, o.ORDER_STATUS orderStatus, o.ORDER_TIME orderTime, o.ORDER_NO orderNo, o.PAY_TIME payTime, o.PAY_TYPE payType, o.PAY_MONEY payMoney, o.IN_TIME inTime, o.PARKING_ID parkingId, o.IN_DURATION inDuration, o.CARD_NUMBER cardNumber, o.DISCOUNT_MONEY discountMoney, o.PAID_MONEY paidMoney, o.SELLER_ID sellerId, o.OUT_TIME outTime, o.ORDER_SYN_STATUS orderSynStatus, o.ORDER_PAY_STATUS orderPayStatus, o.CAR_ID carId, o.CAR_COLOR carColor, o.CAR_TYPE carType, o.ORDER_TRADE orderTrade, o.BILLING_TYPER billingTyper, o.LANE lane from TB_ORDER o where 1 = 1
o.OUT_PARKING_ID = #outParkingId:VARCHAR#
o.CAR_NUMBER like '%$carNumber$%'
to_date(o.IN_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')>=#startDate:TIMESTAMP#
to_date(o.IN_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')<=#endDate:TIMESTAMP#
o.BILLING_TYPER = #billingTyper:VARCHAR#
) x order by to_date(x.inTime,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') desc ) b where rownum <= #end#) where rn > #start#
